title: (Mon Early Bird) Ben Rector Performs Bobby’s Favorite Song + Spill the Tea + Lunchbox Calls as Morgan’s Dad to Get A Refund
itunes:title: (Mon Early Bird) Ben Rector Performs Bobby’s Favorite Song + Spill the Tea + Lunchbox Calls as Morgan’s Dad to Get A Refund
description:
Ben Rector brings in his keyboard and performs his song “Steady Love” which is one of Bobby’s favorites so far this year. A very controversial Spill the Tea for someone who didn’t see it coming and had a lot of explaining to do. Lunchbox calls posing as Morgan’s to get a refund after she got the dates wrong for an art exhibit.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
